title: Is K-pop better than pop? - Quora

response.answer_text: This is a fully opinionated question. The other answer to this question was toxic, since there’s no reason to say that someone has more talent, or that they’re more creative. However, getting back on topic, the answer really depends on who you ask since some people say pop and others say K-Pop. But neither is better, they’re both just a genre of music, which both have some iconic songs. Example, everyone knows Gangnam Style, and everyone knows Bye Bye Bye. So the answer is basically that it depends on who you ask, and their opinion. In my opinion, kpop is better, but for others, it could be pop.
NO. BTS and those guys will never be better than Michael Jackson, David Bowie, The Weekend, Ed Sheeran or Lady Gaga who sing better, are more talented and have more creativity.
